Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-45620 affecting package opensc for versions less than 0.26.1-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-45620 affecting package opensc for versions less than 0.26.1-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package opensc is earlier than 0.26.1-1, affected by CVE-2024-45620
